title: My Account has been hacked help me please ticket is not responding
body: I decided to come back to LoL I started playing in season 4 and suddenly I checked my history and started to see random games played in season 5 as you may see in op.gg so if anyone wants to help or want additional information DM me thanks <3. P.S My Brother wrote this of my account if you're wondering this is my brother's account which he really wants back

replies.body: Have your brother reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  We'll take a look and see if there's anything we can do.  As a heads up, I highly recommend you guys create your own accounts to prevent confusion or issues like this in the future.  Account security is important, and the first step is to keep that information to yourself.  We'll reply back to his ticket as soon as we can.

Yh Im sure he made at least 3 tickets about his account but there were a long time ago the reason me (Bubble Farts) talking about this issue now is because he really wanted to play League with Me and he said It will take to long to make an account and play on it and thats one of the reasons and the other one is what a said above :(
